meta.title: Terms of Service - KeepsVault
meta.description: Read our terms of service for using KeepsVault.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of KeepsVault. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using KeepsVault, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

service.title: Description of Service
service.description: KeepsVault is a secure platform for organizing and sharing important documents and information.

user.title: User Responsibilities
user.description: Users are responsible for maintaining the security of their accounts and the accuracy of their information.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect and use your information.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: KeepsVault shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have questions about these terms, contact us at legal@keepsvault.com
